tool_description: The MoMo Open API testing workspace is structured to foster a cooperative space for developers and testers to meticulously scrutinize APIs prior to their launch. This workspace comes with diverse collections that assist in executing a range of tests on MoMo APIs and their go-live readiness.
name: MoMo Open APIs
title: MoMo Open APIs

api_list.name: getAccountBalance
api_list.description:
## Headers Description

**Authorization** The request is authenticated using a Bearer Token, which is the Access_token. This token is automatically generated in the pre-request script of the collection.

**X-Target-Environment** The identifier on the API Request specifying which country the årequest is to be processed for production, during testing **sandbox** is used.

**Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key** Subscription key which provides access to the APIM. Found in your [Profile](https://momodeveloper.mtn.com/developer)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com//disbursement/v1_0/account/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com//disbursement/v1_0/account/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: statusRequestToPay
api_list.description:
The request URL contains the Varible fd0d3b56-8d19-42ea-a3ce-7850238fc307 X-Reference_Id of the Debit Transaction of Intrest.

## Headers Descriptions

**X-Target-Environment** The identifier on the API specifying which country is the request meant for where the transaction shall be processed in production, sandbox is for testing

**Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key** Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your [Profile](https://momodeveloper.mtn.com/developer)

required_parameters.name: Request_ID_Debit
required_parameters.description: Request Id of the debit request Posted

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

api_list.name: basicUserinfo
api_list.description:
## Headers Description

**Authorization** The request is authenticated using a Bearer Token, which is the Access_token. This token is automatically generated in the pre-request script of the collection.

**X-Target-Environment** The identifier on the API Request specifying which country the årequest is to be processed for production, during testing **sandbox** is used.

**Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key** Subscription key which provides access to the APIM. Found in your [Profile](https://momodeveloper.mtn.com/developer)

Name Validation Check is done against the MSISDN with the Country code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com//disbursement/v1_0/accountholder/msisdn/46733123450/basicuserinfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: refundStatus
api_list.description:
To check Status of the refund, The Get Status Requet uses the value for {{Request_ID_refund}}, this is also mapped as the X-Reference-Id in the Refund Request

## Headers Descriptions

**X-Target-Environment** The identifier on the API specifying which country is the request meant for where the transaction shall be processed in production, sandbox is for testing

**Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key** Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your [Profile](https://momodeveloper.mtn.com/developer) **(Refund utilizes the Disbursment Subscription Key because its a Disburse/ Transer)**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com//disbursement/v1_0/refund/85c66b88-abb8-4523-a81d-2d5566816c70"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com//disbursement/v1_0/refund/{request_id_refund}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "momo-open-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
